title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 345.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 345.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

It is the responsibility of the Department of Social

Services (department) to provide procedures utilized in conjunction with
activities related to the offset of State tax refunds for persons not otherwise
served by the State Child Support Enforcement Program. This Part establishes
the procedures to be followed by applicants for tax refund offset services, and
by individuals who may object to the offset of their tax
refund. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
345.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
